creator: jglick@apache.org
text:
Obscure; detected in

http://www.netbeans.org/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=70815

Easy to reproduce: just run this target twice in a row:

        <copy todir=".">
            <fileset dir="." includes="nonexistent"/>
        </copy>
        <presetdef name="copy">
            <copy verbose="true"/>
        </presetdef>

You get (in Ant 1.7 dev):

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.apache.tools.ant.IntrospectionHelper.supportsNestedElement(IntrospectionHelper.java:647)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.UnknownElement.handleChild(UnknownElement.java:528)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.UnknownElement.handleChildren(UnknownElement.java:332)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.UnknownElement.configure(UnknownElement.java:182)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.UnknownElement.maybeConfigure(UnknownElement.java:158)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Task.getReplacement(Task.java:434)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Task.perform(Task.java:384)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.execute(Target.java:356)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.performTasks(Target.java:384)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeSortedTargets(Project.java:1243)
[...]
